Nerangs.ab: yaθā ahū vairiiō čahār guftan zōhr abar mayānag ī barsom ud māhrōy nihišn ud pad š́iiaoθənanąm frāztar barišn ō ī sar ī barsom pad sidīgar yatāhūwairyō ē widest abāz dāštan

"(The zōt) should recite four times the yaθā ahū vairiiō and put the zōhr on the middle of the barsom and the māhrōy. At š́iiaoθənanąm, he has to move it further forward, to the end of the barsom. At the third yaθā ahū vairiiō, he should lift it up one widest."

Quotations.ab: u-š tā ō xšaθrəmcā ī sidīgar pad war ī zōhrag dārišn u-š pad xšaθrəmcā ī sidīgar abāz ō barsom āwarišn u-š pas ō dast ī zōt dahišn tā ō ẏāiš azāθā mahmāi x́iiātā auuaŋhē

"(The rāspīg) has to keep it by the side of the zōhrag until the third xšaθrəmcā. At the third xšaθrəmcā, has to bring it back to the barsom. Then, he has to give it to the hand of the zōt until ẏāiš azāθā mahmāi x́iiātā auuaŋhē."
